title: At Novopavlivka direction Russian army shelled Krasnohorivka, Heorhiyivka, Paraskoviyivka of Donetsk region. Russian aviation...
content: At Novopavlivka direction Russian army shelled Krasnohorivka, Heorhiyivka, Paraskoviyivka of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrike at Vuhledar of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
